approval_data.project_name: V-KYC recordings to be fetched for Audit requirements
approval_data.project_summary: Develop a portal/dashboard for V-KYC team leads to access and download V-KYC recordings for audit purposes.
project_goals: Provide easy access to V-KYC recordings for audit requirements.
Reduce dependency on IT for retrieving recordings.
approval_data.business_context: The V-KYC team currently relies on the IT data server team to provide recordings, which are stored on the LTF ‘NFS(Network File System)’ server. This manual process is time-consuming and inefficient.

requirements.description: A portal/dashboard should be created for accessing V-KYC recordings.
Access to the portal should be provided to the leads of VKYC process (TL & Process Manager).
All V-KYC recordings should be available on the portal.
Recordings should be fetched as and when required.
Recordings should be searchable by LAN ID.
Recordings should be available date and month wise.
An option for users to upload an Excel or text file with LAN IDs should be available.
The system should process the request from the uploaded file via backend API.
Results should be displayed in a tabular format with a "Download All" option.
The table should have pagination displaying only 10 records at a time.
Only 10 records should be downloaded at a time.
The file upload should accept csv/txt files.
The access for the screen will be available to very limited users (only Team leaders)

functional_requirements: Filter recordings by date and month.
Display results in a tabular format.
non_functional_requirements: Access to the portal should be restricted to authorized users (Team Leaders).
success_criteria: V-KYC recordings are easily accessible to authorized users.
Reduced dependency on IT for retrieving recordings.
constraints: Recordings are stored on LTF ‘NFS(Network File System)’ server.
File upload should accept csv/txt files.
File will contain min 2 and maxmium 50 LanIDs
assumptions: The backend API for processing requests will be available.
The necessary infrastructure for the portal/dashboard will be available.
risks: Technical issues with the NFS server.

recommendations: Specify the performance requirements for the portal.

recommendations_for_completion: Define security measures for the portal.
Specify performance metrics (e.g., response time, number of concurrent users).
